item.description:
i'm breaking my own rule here, because unfortunately i can't specify a time, but I plan on surfing on Saturday if anyone would like to join me.

In the morning I am volunteering at shark fest downtown:
http://www.sharkfestswim.com/default.asp?PageID=21262
(you are welcome to volunteer too!)

So whenever the volunteer thing is done, i am going to head north to surf. we can meet at zapstix early afternoon (i anticipate around 1 or 2pm, but it could be earlier). if you rsvp here, maybe we can exchange numbers ahead of time and i can update you on my schedule as the morning progresses.

i don't have a smart phone so won't be able to update online here.

beginners welcome to come rent a board/wetsuit...but i'm not scheduling a lesson this time.
item.how_to_find_us: i drive a blue subaru and will be hanging out at the shop to meet people
item.name: gone surfing
